pr_title: Changed ViewState and XFrameOption to return example alerts for the docs

timeline.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText: Oops I guess this should only be associated with line 199.
replies.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText: No - they are just example alerts. I dont think we can document every possible variation.
replies.author: psiinon
